description: Populate zip-web pods for all 42 decks. One story per deck. Each story populates 40 pods (5 Types √ó 8 Colors). Deck 07 is already complete as the prototype.

userStories.title: Populate pods for Deck 07 ‚Äî ‚õΩüèõ Strength √ó Basics
userStories.note: Completed as hand-built prototype. Quality bar for all other decks.
acceptanceCriteria: All 40 pods in deck-07-pods.md have N/E/S/W populated
Every neighbor is a valid zip from zip-web-registry.md
No pod has Type repetition across N/E/S/W
Hub Type does not appear in any N/E/S/W slot
All 5 Types represented in every pod
Coaching rationale present for all 160 pairings (40 pods √ó 4 directions)
Directional character honored: N=Progression, E=Balance, S=Recovery, W=Exploration
